name: Crazy 4x4 Monster Truck Racer 2017-Stunt Racing 3D
description:
The winter season is begin now It's time to become the mad racer of the heavy 4x4 monster truck. Drive this cool monster truck safely, you need to be very careful in this race battle as the streets of the city are full of dirt and snow. This is a super insane Monster truck 3D racing game.
You will love to drive that cool monster truck. Get into driving seat of the 4x4 monster trucks and push the race pedal to demolish the racing cars! perform stunts on the broken bridges that come on your way to victory.

This game is full of racing 3D madness! Don't afraid of high speed. Smash the mad cars on your way by using the turbo of engine.

4X4 Monster Truck Crazy Racer Features:

- Its Free for life time!
- Race with 6 powerful monster trucks!
- Race and win to customize the Mad monster Trucks
- Explore the breathtaking views of snowy winter tracks in city
- Earn Gold to unlock new trucks and upgrade them. It's Free!
- Extreme Fast racing tracks for getting top speed
- Sunlight and Night Modes for real racing
- Slow motion Camera effects while performing stunts
- Most realistic Racing dynamics( brakes, engine, acceleration, brakes, drifts, etc)
- Climb up the Top charts with leaderboards score!


Gameplay
• Real steering mode
• Automatic Transmission
• Live units for speed measurement
• 3 Uniques camera angles to drive the 4x4 Heavy Truck, choose according to your driving style
• Realistic simulation of all aspect (engine, drive, brakes, tires, etc.)


Realistic Controls for Truck Balance
• Tilt Screen
• Using Car Steering
• By tapping on the left and right controls on the screen
